attributes.action: Create a new day called paeday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From the wise leader of men Baz;

I propose that we add a new day in between Friday and Saturday which shall be called Paeday.

We still work the same 5 days a week but we have a 3 day weekend starting on Paeday and ending on Sunday.

The year would still have 365 days so we would need to get rid of 2 months so I propose deleting January & Febuary, which are both cold months anyway and most prople are broke.

So immediately after December we would be into March and the summer is only 3 months away while we have paddy's day just 17 days into the new years.

Sadly Valentines day would have to be scraped but it was only a Hallmark commercialism day anyway. Unfortunately for people like me with a Birthday in January this also wold have to be scrapped but can live with that if I get my Paeday.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
